My Creative Process

My Goal Is To Make Every Site A Pleasant Experience. From The Layout To The Animations Every Site Should Be Fast, Beautiful, And Easy To Use.

1

Discuss The Project

The beauty is in the details. This is why I put so much importance on our first meeting. Colors, images, themes, features, etc. are all part of making a site feel professional and suit your business.

2

Concept

Before I start creating a feature, I make a mock-up of the layout I'm envisioning. This lets me pivot if needed (Change UI, colors, etc.) before developement.

3

Develop

As I develop, I will often look for feedback as I complete sections of the project. This is to ensure my vision and the project vision are still aligned.

4

Deploy

(For Small Business Clients) Upon project completion, I will provide all files needed for deployment of the site.

I can also host your small business site for you (For Additional Cost).
